author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Please add
```
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
to your project file and retrigger the bot.

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/adamslc/EnhancedLogging.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- a9e59570-8d01-11e9-81a7-9e56797f5e48 -->
